ctu_text: **Objectives of the SUMAN scheme-** 1. This scheme offers zero expenses and access to detection and management of complications during and after pregnancy. 1. Pregnant women can avail a zero-expense delivery and C-section facility at public health facilities.

", "answer": "Infant mortality rate (IMR) is the number of deaths per 1,000 live births of children under one year of age.
